meanings.sent1: The shlemiehls tripped over their own feet.
meanings.sent2: She always felt like a shlemiehls when trying to dance.
meanings.sent3: The shlemiehls tried to juggle eggs but ended up with a mess.
meanings.sent4: His attempts at cooking turned him into a shlemiehls in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The village was full of shlemiehls who couldn't tie their own shoes.

meanings.sent1: The shlemiehls couldn't fix the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the office shlemiehls for always messing up presentations.
meanings.sent3: The shlemiehls tried to assemble the furniture but ended up with extra parts.
meanings.sent4: Her gardening skills turned her into a shlemiehls with a green thumb.
meanings.sent5: The team was full of shlemiehls who couldn't score a goal to save their lives.
